text: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

translation.en: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss
translation.id: Nuh berkata, "Ya Tuhanku, sesungguhnya mereka durhaka kepadaku, dan mereka mengikuti orang-orang yang harta dan anak-anaknya hanya menambah kerugian baginya
